metadata.title: CVE-2024-46304 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: A Buffer Overflow vulnerability in libcoap v4.3.5-rc2 and below allows aremote attacker to cause a denial of service via thecoap_handle_request_put_block function in src/coap_block.c.

criterions.comment: libcoap2 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
